description: Christopher, Warren -- Photographs; Rabin, Yitzhak, 1922-1995 -- Photographs
label: Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin with US Secretary of State Warren Christopher at Rabin's Tel Aviv offices, March 9 1995, Christopher's visit to the region and attempted shuttle diplomacy between Jerusalem and Damascus was this time accompanied by rumours that some sort of breakthrough had taken place in negotiations between Israel and Syria.
